message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am extending a special introductory offer for you. Would you be interested in discussing this further? If so, I propose a price of $14000 for the product. I look forward to your positive response.
